channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for PR

item.title: Report X-2024101019
item.description:
Report X-2024101019

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-13
  • City: CAROLINA
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A plastic jerrycan was found with a broken cap during sort operations at the SJURT location. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
